Name: Recommendation
Description: A letter that recommends an individual for a position in the administration.

Name: School
Description: A letter that deals with issues related to Libanius' school.

Name: Personal
Description: A letter whose purpose is to maintain his relationship with the recipient and/or discuss personal issues with him.

Name: Favour
Description: A letter whose purpose is to obtain a favour from the recipient.

Name: Municipal
Description: A letter that deals with issues related to the City Council and/or the Decurions.

Name: Introduction/Reference
Description: A letter that introduces an individual to another for another purpose than obtaining a position in the administration.
